original_text: Zimri, one of his officials, who had command of half his chariots, plotted against him. Elah was in Tirzah at the time, getting drunk in the home of Arza, the palace administrator at Tirzah.
korean_text: 엘라가 디르사에 있어 왕궁 맡은 자 아르사의 집에서 마시고 취할 때에 그 신하 곧 병거 절반을 통솔한 지휘관 시므리가 왕을 모반하여

sentences.korean_translation: 심리는 그의 관리 중 한 사람이었으며,

sentences.original_text: who had command of half his chariots,
Elah was in Tirzah at the time,
getting drunk in the home of Arza,
